alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 1:13AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Marin, western Alameda, northwestern Santa Cruz, San Mateo, western Contra Costa, San Francisco and northwestern Santa Clara Counties through 215 AM PST... At 113 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Muir Beach to 19 miles southwest of El Granada. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Francisco, Oakland, Fremont, Hayward, Concord, Berkeley, Richmond, Daly City, San Mateo, San Leandro, Redwood City, Mountain View, Alameda, Union City, Palo Alto, Walnut Creek, South San Francisco, San Rafael, San Bruno and Pacifica. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
